lyrics.lyric: Remember Me
lyrics.tlyric: 请记住我

lyrics.lyric: Remember me
lyrics.tlyric: 请记住我吧

lyrics.lyric: Though I have to say goodbye
lyrics.tlyric: 虽然我要说再见了

lyrics.lyric: Remember me
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我

lyrics.lyric: Don't let it make you cry
lyrics.tlyric: 希望你别哭泣

lyrics.lyric: For even if I'm far away
lyrics.tlyric: 就算我远行

lyrics.lyric: I hold you in my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 我也将你放在心里

lyrics.lyric: I sing a secret song to you
lyrics.tlyric: 我都要唱一首秘密给你听

lyrics.lyric: Each night we are apart
lyrics.tlyric: 每个分开的夜晚

lyrics.lyric: Remember me
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我

lyrics.lyric: Though I have to travel far
lyrics.tlyric: 虽然我要远行

lyrics.lyric: Remember me
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我

lyrics.lyric: Each time you hear a sad guitar
lyrics.tlyric: 每当你听见悲伤的吉他声

lyrics.lyric: Know that I'm with you
lyrics.tlyric: 要知道是我与你在一起

lyrics.lyric: The only way that I can be
lyrics.tlyric: 那是我能做的唯一方式

lyrics.lyric: Until you're in my arms again
lyrics.tlyric: 直在你回到我的怀抱之前

lyrics.lyric: Remember me
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我

lyrics.lyric: Que nuestra canción no deje de latir

lyrics.lyric: Unidos en nuestra canción
lyrics.tlyric: 在我们的歌声里（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: Contigo ahí estaré
lyrics.tlyric: 我会一直和你在一起（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: Recuérdame
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: Recuérdame
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: Aun en la distancia

lyrics.lyric: Nunca vayas a olvidar

lyrics.lyric: Que yo contigo siempre voy
lyrics.tlyric: 我会一直和你在一起（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: Recuérdame
lyrics.tlyric: 记住我吧（西班牙语）

lyrics.lyric: If you close your eyes and let the music play
lyrics.tlyric: 若你闭上眼睛让音乐响起
